seo: 用友GRP-U8,任意文件上传,财务管理软件,hvv2022
seo_en: Yonyou GRP-U8,file upload vulnerability,financial management software,hvv2022
summary: 该插件旨在检测用友GRP-U8财务管理软件中的任意文件上传漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求来验证是否存在漏洞并返回结果。
summary_en: This plugin is designed to detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in Yonyou GRP-U8 financial management software by sending specific HTTP requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability and return the results.
